title: Retrieve a UK Property Business' Accounting Adjustments
description: This endpoint allows the user to request the adjustments made to a specific UK Property Business Source Adjustable Summary by quoting it's identifier.

typeOfBusiness.description:
The type of business the loss applies to.

Limited to the following possible values:

foreign-property-fhl-eea

foreign-property

accountingPeriod.description: Object containing the accounting period start and end dates

startDate.description: The date the accounting period started

endDate.description: The date the accounting period ended

taxYear.description: The tax year into which this accounting period falls

requestedDateTime.description: The date and time the summary calculation was originally requested, prior to any adjustments

bsasId.description:
The unique identifier of the summary calculation.

Must conform to the regular expression:

^[0-9]{8}|[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-

[1-5][0-9a-f]{3}-[89ab][0-9a-f]{3}-

[0-9a-f]{12}$

summaryStatus.description:
The status of the this calculated summary, limited to the following possible values:

    valid
    invalid
    superseded

adjustedSummary.description: Indicates whether or not the summary includes adjusted values.

bsas.description: Object holding the BSAS for either Foreign Property Furnished Holiday Let in the EEA business income source or for any other type Foreign Property.

income.description: The total income for the income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

expenses.description: The total expenses for the income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

additions.description: The total additions to net profit (or deduction to net loss). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

deductions.description: The total deductions to net loss (or addition to net profit). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

net.description: The net profit of income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

taxable.description: The taxable net profit of the income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

net.description: The net loss of income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

adjustedIncomeTax.description: The adjusted income tax loss. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

incomeBreakdown.description: Total income broken down by type for the tax year to date

rentIncome.description: The total amount of property rental Income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

premiumsOfLeaseGrant.description: Premiums received for the grant of a lease and other lump sums to possess a property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

otherPropertyIncome.description: Other income from property, such as rent charges and ground rents, income from letting others tip waste on your land, and income for the use of a caravan or houseboat at a fixed location. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

foreignTaxTakenOff.description:
The total amount of foreign tax taken off your income.

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

specialWithholdingTaxOrUKTaxPaid.description:
Tax withheld (in UK Pounds) on certain payments to UK residents or UK Tax taken off rental Income (applies to non-resident landlords only)

The value must be greater than 0 and up to 99999999999.99.

expensesBreakdown.description: Total expenses broken down by type for the tax year to date

premisesRunningCosts.description: Rent, rates, insurance, ground rents etc. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

repairsAndMaintenance.description: Property repairs and maintenance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

financialCosts.description: Loan interest and other financial costs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

professionalFees.description: Legal, management and other professional fees. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

travelCosts.description: Car, van and travel costs incurred in running a property business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

costOfServices.description: Cost of services provided, including wages. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

residentialFinancialCost.description: Captures residential financial cost that can be deductible from rental income (tax relief). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

broughtFwdResidentialFinancialCost.description: Amount of relief brought forward for restricted residential financial costs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

other.description: Other allowable property expenses. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

consolidatedExpenses.description: Sum of all expenses for the specified period. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
